verbs.description: Before [V: departing] [ARGM-GOL: for his summit in Singapore with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] held his first solo press conference since Feb. 2017 and spoke about his expectations for the highly anticipated meeting .
